group.name: ${ challenge.name }
group.description:
Welcome to Topcoder ${ challenge.track } challenge!
Please post your questions in this forum, thanks!

discussions.title: Challenge Overview
discussions.body:
[Back to Challenge Details page](<%- challenge.url %>)
<% _.forEach(challenge.prizeSets, function(prizeSet) { %>* <%- prizeSet.type %>: <% _.forEach(prizeSet.prizes, function(prize) { %><%- prize.value %>$ <% }) %>
<% }); %>

discussions.title: Please give us feedback on this challenge!
discussions.body:
Hi Competitors,

At topcoder, we are always trying to continuously improve how we are running competitions and tasks for our competitors. Part of this involves getting feedback from you on how well our tasks and challenges are being managed.

Please take 2-3 minutes to fill out this survey. The results will be used to identify areas of improvement, follow on training, procedural changes, etc.

 https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/3SYYTHP?Challenge_ID=<%- challenge.id %>

discussions.title: Welcome!
discussions.body: Please read the requirements carefully. If you have questions, please let me know, I'll be glad to help you.
